Sports and Clubs: Badminton, swimming, jogging, chatting with friends and listening folk songs and dances.
Social And Cultural Activities: Litracy, health education, woman empowerment, child labour eradication, irrigation, drinking water to all were carried out in a campaign mode; creation of awareness on self help for improving quality of living
Favourite Pastime and Recreation: Paper reading, meeting people, watching political debates on T.V., listening folk songs
Special Interests: Creating awareness on how to live better to improve quality of life and education & health are the tools through which poverty can be reduced
Educational Qualifications: B.Sc.(Agriculture) Educated at Acharya N.G. Ranga Agricultural University, Hyderabad, Andhra Pradesh
Other Information: The Chief Executive Officer during 2001-2009; Implementing poverty preventive programmes such as (a) education to all, (b) health to all, (c) drinking water to all and (d) nutritive food to all
